verses.verse: You shall not sacrifice <WH2076> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> an ox, <WH7794> or a sheep, <WH7716> in which is a blemish, <WH3971> or anything evil; <WH7451> for that is an abomination <WH8441> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

If there is found <WH4672> in the midst <WH7130> of you, <WH259> within any of your gates <WH8179> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, <WH376> man or woman, <WH802> who does <WH6213> that which is evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> in transgressing <WH5674> his covenant, <WH1285>

and has gone <WH3212> and served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worshiped <WH7812> them, <WH8121> or the sun, or the moon, <WH3394> or any of the army <WH6635> of the sky, <WH8064> which I have not commanded; <WH6680>

and it be told <WH5046> you, <WH8085> and you have heard of it, <WH1875> then you shall inquire diligently; <WH3190> and behold, <WH571> if it be true, and the thing <WH1697> certain, <WH3559> that such abomination <WH8441> is done <WH6213> in Israel, <WH3478>

then you shall bring forth <WH3318> that man <WH376> or that woman, <WH802> who has done <WH6213> this evil <WH7451> thing, <WH1697> to your gates, <WH8179> even the man <WH376> or the woman; <WH802> and you shall stone <WH5619> them to death <WH4191> with stones. <WH5619>

The hand <WH3027> of the witnesses <WH5707> shall be first <WH7223> on him to put him to death, <WH4191> and afterward <WH314> the hand <WH3027> of all the people. <WH5971> So you shall put <WH1197> away <WH1197> the evil <WH7451> from the midst of you. <WH7130>

If there arises a matter <WH1697> too hard <WH6381> for you in judgment, <WH4941> between blood <WH1818> and blood, <WH1818> between plea <WH1779> and plea, <WH1779> and between stroke <WH5061> and stroke, <WH5061> being matters <WH1697> of controversy <WH7379> within your gates; <WH8179> then you shall arise, <WH6965> and go up <WH5927> to the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose; <WH977>

and you shall come <WH935> to the priests <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> and to the judge <WH8199> who shall be in those days: <WH3117> and you shall inquire; <WH1875> and they shall show <WH5046> you the sentence <WH1697> of judgment. <WH4941>

according to the tenor <WH6310> of the law <WH8451> which they shall teach <WH3384> you, <WH4941> and according to the judgment which they shall tell <WH559> you, <WH6213> you shall do; you shall not turn aside <WH5493> from the sentence <WH1697> which they shall show <WH5046> you, <WH3225> to the right hand, nor to the left. <WH8040>

The man <WH376> who does <WH6213> presumptuously, <WH2087> in not listening <WH8085> to the priest <WH3548> who stands <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> there before Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> or to the judge, <WH8199> even that man <WH376> shall die: <WH4191> and you shall put away <WH1197> the evil <WH7451> from Israel. <WH3478>
All the people <WH5971> shall hear, <WH8085> and fear, <WH3372> and do no more presumptuously. <WH2102>

When you have come <WH935> to the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, <WH3423> and shall possess it, <WH3427> and shall dwell therein, <WH559> and shall say, "I will set <WH7760> a king <WH4428> over me, <WH1471> like all the nations that are around me; <WH5439>"

you shall surely <WH7760> set <WH7760> him king <WH4428> over yourselves, <WH3068> whom Yahweh your God <WH430> shall choose: <WH977> one from among <WH7130> your brothers <WH251> you shall set <WH7760> king <WH4428> over you; <WH3201> you may not put <WH5414> a foreigner <WH5237> over you, <WH251> who is not your brother.

and it shall be with him, <WH7121> and he shall read therein all the days <WH3117> of his life; <WH2416> that he may learn <WH3925> to fear <WH3372> Yahweh <WH3068> his God, <WH430> to keep <WH8104> all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451> and these statutes, <WH2706> to do them; <WH6213>

that his heart <WH3824> not be lifted up <WH7311> above his brothers, <WH251> and that he not turn aside <WH5493> from the commandment, <WH4687> to the right hand, <WH3225> or to the left: <WH8040> to the end that he may prolong <WH748> his days <WH3117> in his kingdom, <WH4467> he and his children, <WH1121> in the midst <WH7130> of Israel. <WH3478>
